information.name: Slothful Pages
information.description: We only sell sloth related books.

product.title: Sloths in the Amazon
product.author: Hayley Dodkins
product.description: About sloths living in the amazon

product.title: Life in the Sloth Lane: Slow Down and Smell the Hibiscus
product.author: Lucy Cooke
product.description: Perhaps it’s because they’ve mastered the art of taking it slow in a world whose frenzied pace is driving the rest of us crazy. Here, in a mindfulness book like no other, heart-tuggingly cute photographs of these always-chill creatures are paired with words of wisdom, all to inspire us to slow down, stop to enjoy the little things, and come up relaxed, centered, and smiling.

product.title: Mindful Mr. Sloth
product.author: Katy Hudson
product.description: Mr. Sloth has one speed--slow. He loves to do things one at a time, at a nice, easy pace. Can Mr. Sloth's mindful ways teach Sasha to slow down and enjoy life?

product.title: "Slowly, Slowly, Slowly," said the Sloth
product.author: Eric Carle
product.description: Slowly, slowly, slowly . . . that's the way the sloth moves. Slowly, it eats and then, slowly, it falls asleep. "What strange kind of creature is this?" the other animals wonder.

product.title: Where's the Sloth?: A Super Sloth Search Book
product.author: Andy Rowland
product.description: Ever since Suzi sloth began to wonder about the world beyond her rainforest home, she’s longed for adventure. So she gathered her friends and they’re all going on a globetrotting tour of amazing cities.

product.title: Bedtime for Baby Sloth
product.author: Danielle McLean
product.description: High up in the treetops, Mommy Sloth calls to her baby, “Come down, little one. It’s time for bed.” But Baby Sloth isn’t ready for bed. First she needs to say good night to the moon. And then she needs to sing a song to the birds. And what about a bedtime snack? Will Baby Sloth EVER be ready for bed?

product.title: What is a Sloth?
product.author: Ginger Swift
product.description: Surprise and delight with bright artwork and fun sloth facts found under every flap

product.title: I Love You Slow Much
product.author: Rose Rossner
product.description: There's nothing better than hanging together with someone you love slow much! Combining gorgeous illustrations, charming animal puns, and an evergreen message of love and encouragement, this wildly sweet book is a pun-derful way show your llamazing little one you'll always be there.

product.title: The Little Book of Sloth Philosophy
product.author: Jennifer McCartney
product.description: Relax, unwind and soak up the wisdom of the sloth with the slowest page turner you’ll ever read.

product.title: Sloth and Squirrel in a Pickle
product.author: Cathy Ballou Mealey
product.description: A speedy squirrel and a sleepy sloth try to get the job done in this funny, heartwarming tale of two lovable, but unlikely, friends.
